content: Public corporation owned by Idan Ofer **Kenon Holdings** is a public corporation, which is a spin off from [Israel Corporation](/wiki/Israel_Corporation), traded on the [New York Stock Exchange](/wiki/New_York_Stock_Exchange) and the [Tel Aviv Stock Exchange](/wiki/Tel_Aviv_Stock_Exchange). Owned by Israeli businessman [Idan Ofer](/wiki/Idan_Ofer), it controls Israel Corp's investment in companies such as [Qoros](/wiki/Qoros). ## Overview The company was founded in 2014 as a spin off from the [Israel Corporation](/wiki/Israel_Corporation). In 2017, it announced plans to build [Kiryat Gat](/wiki/Kiryat_Gat) power station in Israel. Headquartered at the [Millenia Tower](/wiki/Millenia_Tower) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), it employs 5,766 and is traded both on the New York Stock Exchange and the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange as KEN. The holding includes investments in [Zim Integrated Shipping Services](/wiki/Zim_Integrated_Shipping_Services), and OPC Energy Ltd. - [List of companies of Singapore](/wiki/List_of_companies_of_Singapore) This [Singaporean corporation or company](/wiki/List_of_companies_of_Singapore) article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Kenon Holdings
